text: Victor Theodore Stelly (January 11, 1941 â€“ December 26, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the Republican Party. Stelly was born in Carencro, Louisiana. From From 1988 to 2004, he was a member of the Louisiana House of Representatives. Stelly died on December 26, 2020 in Lake Charles, Louisiana from problems caused by COVID-19 at the age of 79. His wife, Terry Bass, died hours after him from the same infection. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Louisiana Category:Politicians from Louisiana Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana
title: Vic Stelly
